title: Do You Understand the Seriousness of it All?
itunes:title: Do You Understand the Seriousness of it All?
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners really cared or understood the seriousness of the insurrection that happened on this day, last year. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to two people for losing their cool at basketball game and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners really cared or understood the seriousness of the insurrection that happened on this day, last year.
